entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning near midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow in the morning then to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
